properties.Name: The International Parenting Group English Class
properties.Description: The International Parenting Group Playgroup runs each Monday from 2-3.30pm at 5 Twigger St Addington. Caregivers and babies welcome, no need to register, no cost to join and there is a play area available for children.

properties.Name: Canterbury Parents Walking Group
properties.Description: Canterbury Parents Walking Group is fun for all ages. Check the Canterbury Plunket Facebook Page for locations.

properties.Name: Fendalton Asian Plunket Playgroup
properties.Description: Tuesdays 1pm-3pm (under 6 months) Wednesdays 10am-12pm (over 6 months). Please note bookings are essential
